rules_text:
Foreshadow {3}{B}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Doomsday Horde enters tapped unless it was foreshadowed.
When Doomsday Horde dies, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
